name: 蕭勝輝
objective: 本課程介紹高分子的合成方法及反應機構，合成方式包含逐步聚合反應、鏈鎖聚合反應、配位聚合反應及共聚合反應，並介紹高分子的化學反應及其他高分子合成相關新技術。
schedule:
1. Introduction to synthetic polymers
2. Vinyl Polymers-Free radical polymerization
3. Vinyl Polymers-Ionic polymerization
4. Vinyl polymerization with complex coordination catalysts
5. Reactions of vinyl polymers
6. Step-reaction and ring-opening polymerization
7. Polyethers, polysulfides, and related polymers
8. Polyesters and related polymers
9. Polyamides and related polymers
10. Phenol-, urea-, and melamine-formaldehyde polymers
11. Heterocyclic polymers
12. Inorganic and partially inorganic polymers
13. Miscellaneous organic polymers
scorePolicy: 作業、期中測驗、期末測驗、期末報告
materials: Malcolm P. Stevens, Polymer Chemistry, 3rd Ed., Oxford University Press, Inc. (1999)
